content: Creation based on several files and folders is not available for this type of room. To create such a room, go to the {{sectionName}} section or use one of the PDF forms.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a tooltip message indicating that file-based room creation is not available for certain types of rooms, directing users to alternative options in the "Rooms" section or using PDF forms. It appears on a dialog component, specifically on a button or option related to room type selection.
